name: Dark Theme
desc: The default NautilusOS theme. Sleek dark interface with teal accents, perfect for extended use and reducing eye strain.
author: Nautilus Labs and dinguschan

name: Light Theme
desc: A bright and clean theme perfect for daytime use. Easy on the eyes with light backgrounds and dark text.
author: Nautilus Labs and dinguschan

name: Golden Theme
desc: Elegant golden accents with warm luxurious dark backgrounds. Perfect for a premium look.
author: Nautilus Labs and lanefiedler

name: Red Theme
desc: Bold and vibrant red accents for those who want to stand out. Energy meets elegance.
author: Nautilus Labs and lanefiedler

name: Blue Theme
desc: Cool and calming blue tones. Professional and soothing for extended use.
author: Nautilus Labs and lanefiedler

name: Purple Theme
desc: Deep shades combined with royal hues, crafted together for the perfect purple theme.
author: Nautilus Labs and lanefiedler

name: Green Theme
desc: Rich shades of green with splashes of lime and seaweed, this is quite the exquisite theme.
author: Nautilus Labs and lanefiedler

name: Liquid Glass
desc: An Apple inspired theme with a beautiful translucent look. Not too clear, but just enough to look like eye candy.
author: Nautilus Labs and hvtrs
